about.aboutContent:
Greenomatics

How much carbon does your car per grocery trip?

How much money do you spend on gas per trip?

Find out by entering your address as the starting point and your preferred grocery store as the end point. You can enter the store address or click on the icons on the map. Additional stops can be added using the "Add Stop" button.Â 

CO2 Emissions and Fuel Cost are calculated on a round-trip basis. These calculations are based on average CO2 emissions of 251 g of CO2 / km (EPA, 2018) and the annual average fuel cost in Calgary of $1.198 / L (Statistics Canada, 2018).

Total time per round trip is reported to illustrate savings in terms of time.
